briefTitle: Clinical Evaluation of OSNA Breast Cancer System to Extensive Frozen Section Histopathology
officialTitle: Intraoperative Examination of Sentinel Lymph Nodes: Comparison of the OSNA Breast Cancer System to Extensive Frozen Section Histopathology
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Prospectively assess the concordance and performance of the OSNA Breast Cancer System with an extensive intraoperative frozen section protocol for SLNs removed using standard SLN biopsy procedures from breast cancer subjects.
